io.micronaut.tracing.instrument.util

Class MdcInstrumenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.tracing.instrument.util.MdcInstrumenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReactiveInstrumenter, RunnableInstrumenter, Function<Runnable,Runnable>

    @Singleton
 @Requires(classes=org.slf4j.MDC.class)
 @Internal
public final class MdcInstrumenter
extends Object
implements Function<Runnable,Runnable>, RunnableInstrumenter, ReactiveInstrumenter
    A function that instruments an existing Runnable with the Mapped Diagnostic Context for Slf4j.
    Since:
    1.1
    Author:
    graemerocher, LarsEckart
